name: T.D.S.
description:
Music credits to Gruber at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=29008

Simple game I threw together to learn Pico 8. Decided not to follow any tutorials and just wing it. Writing my own collision detection brought back memories of Blitz Basic when I was a little kid and really got me wanting to work.

3 enemies later it's served it's purpose.

Enjoy!
